an10.116:4.1: Atha kho ajito paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.116:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an10.116:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho ajito paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an10.116:5.2: Tena pañcamattāni cittaṭṭhānasatāni cintitāni, yehi aññatitthiyā upāraddhāva jānanti upāraddhasmā”ti.
an10.116:6.3: “Etassa, bhagavā, kālo etassa, sugata, kālo yaṃ bhagavā bhāseyya, bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
an10.116:7.1: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an10.116:7.2: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
an10.116:8.1: “Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco adhammikena vādena adhammikaṃ vādaṃ abhiniggaṇhāti abhinippīḷeti, tena ca adhammikaṃ parisaṃ rañjeti.
an10.116:8.2: Tena sā adhammikā parisā uccāsaddamahāsaddā hoti:
an10.116:9.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco adhammikena vādena dhammikaṃ vādaṃ abhiniggaṇhāti abhinippīḷeti, tena ca adhammikaṃ parisaṃ rañjeti.
an10.116:9.2: Tena sā adhammikā parisā uccāsaddamahāsaddā hoti:
an10.116:10.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco adhammikena vādena dhammikañca vādaṃ adhammikañca vādaṃ abhiniggaṇhāti abhinippīḷeti, tena ca adhammikaṃ parisaṃ rañjeti.
an10.116:10.2: Tena sā adhammikā parisā uccāsaddamahāsaddā hoti:
an10.116:11.1: Adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo dhammo ca;
an10.116:11.3: Adhammañca viditvā dhammañca, anatthañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
an10.116:12.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, adhammo, katamo ca dhammo, katamo ca anattho, katamo ca attho?
an10.116:12.4: ye ca micchādiṭṭhipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho;
an10.116:12.5: sammādiṭṭhipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.
an10.116:14.3: ye ca micchāvimuttipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti, ayaṃ anattho;
an10.116:14.4: sammāvimuttipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, ayaṃ attho.
an10.116:15.3: Adhammañca viditvā dhammañca, anatthañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabban’ti, iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttan”ti.
